title: cyber threat
extract: What is a Cyber Threat? For a cybersecurity expert, the Oxford Dictionary definition of cyber threat is a little lacking: "the possibility of a malicious attempt to damage or disrupt a computer network or system." This definition is incomplete without including the attempt to access files and infiltrate or steal data.May 12, 2017
